name: Alice
description: Alice is a young girl that likes desserts, amusement parks and cute stuffed animals. Oh, and the Time Genie and Mr. Bunny!

passiveSkill.name: Perfect DNA
passiveSkill.description: ${d.lens5.skill ? d.lens5.skill : "When Alice dies, she increases the ATK of 1 partner on the battlefield and 1 partner in hand by {placeholder}, and their DEF by {placeholder}. Effect is doubled for Muscipula partners."}

uniqueSkill.name: Anticlockwise
uniqueSkill.description: ${d.lens4.skill ? d.lens4.skill : "An enchanted but shattered clock. Alice attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage, increases the DMG Rate of Muscipula partners by {placeholder} for 3 rounds."}

specialSkill.name: Time Collision
specialSkill.description: ${d.lens6.skill ? d.lens6.skill : "Time is reversed and she now grows younger. Alice attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage, increasing ATK by {placeholder} for 3 rounds.Chance to use skill: {placeholder}"}

normalSkill.name: Raw Force
normalSkill.description: Alice throws a clock at the target. Attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage.

templateData.lens4.skill: An enchanted but shattered clock. Alice attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage, increases the DMG Rate of Muscipula partners by {placeholder} for 3 rounds.
templateData.lens5.skill: When Alice dies, she increases the ATK of 1 partner on the battlefield and 1 partner in hand by {placeholder}, and their DEF by {placeholder}. Effect is doubled for Muscipula partners.
templateData.lens6.skill: Time is reversed and she now grows younger. Alice attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage, increasing ATK by {placeholder} for 3 rounds.Chance to use skill: {placeholder}
